mapper.select: SELECT c.cateid, (c.catename) AS cate_catename, i.itemid, i.itemname, i.itemimg, i.itemplace, i.itemguide, i.itemticket, (o.obj) AS itemoption_obj, (o.price) AS itemoption_price, i.estart, i.efin FROM item AS i INNER JOIN cate AS c ON c.cateid=i.cateid INNER JOIN itemoption AS o ON o.itemid=i.itemid WHERE i.itemid=#{itemid} LIMIT 1

SELECT c.cateid, c.catename, i.itemid, i.itemname, i.itemimg, i.itemplace, i.itemguide, (o.obj) AS itemoption_obj, (o.price) AS itemoption_price, i.itemticket, i.estart, i.efin FROM item AS i INNER JOIN cate AS c ON c.cateid=i.cateid INNER JOIN itemoption AS o ON o.itemid=i.itemid
SELECT * FROM item WHERE itemname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{txt},'%')

SELECT i.itemid, i.itemname, i.itemimg, i.estart, i.efin, r.reviewgrade as review_reviewgrade FROM item i INNER JOIN review r ON i.itemid = r.itemid INNER JOIN cate c ON c.cateid = i.cateid ORDER BY r.reviewgrade DESC LIMIT 6;
